title: The Female Lead Has Disconnected for Eight Years - Novel Updates
tags: Abandoned Children   Absent Parents   Apartment Life   Appearance Different from Actual Age   Bullying   Caring Protagonist   Childcare   Determined Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Long Separations   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day   Poor to Rich   Possessive Characters   Time Travel   Tragic Past   Wealthy Characters
author: 慕璃
description:
Ten years ago, Yu Zhi Le was an older sister that was eight years older than Yu Zi Huan.

Ten years later, Yu Zhi Le, who disappeared from Yu Zi Huan’s life for eight years, is still twenty-two years old.

A cliché short story. A small joke made by the time.>
